overview_of_class: Overview of class: Focus on the professional issues that are critical to function as a well-prepared speech-language pathologist in school, health care, and private practice settings. Areas of emphasis include but are not limited to: ethics, scope of practice, service delivery, support personnel, relevant legislation, policies and guidelines, Common Core State Standards, managed care, professional association governance, certification and licensure, collaboration, private and government health insurance, reimbursement, and advocacy.
name: Delivery Systems in Speech & Language Pathology
title: SoC CSD 334-0-1 Delivery Systems in Speech & Language Pathology

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Overview of class: Focus on the professional issues that are critical to function as a well-prepared speech-language pathologist in school, health care, and private practice settings. Areas of emphasis include but are not limited to: ethics, scope of practice, service delivery, support personnel, relevant legislation, policies and guidelines, Common Core State Standards, managed care, professional association governance, certification and licensure, collaboration, private and government health insurance, reimbursement, and advocacy.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Registration Requirements: CSD Senior status if UG, or graduate student

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Materials on Blackboard. There may be a book.

subject: CSD
